GSD.description:
tracing: Fix sleeping function called from invalid context on RT kernel

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.4 by commit 9abf3db8bdb63ab545034148ef2118f4d088ca59. For more details please see the references link.
